[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-types/src/storage/mod.rs] [Integer arithmetic] [Feature version comparison] Gas feature version comparisons use >= - are there off-by-one errors where version N is treated as N-1 or N+1, applying wrong pricing models? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm-types/src/storage/mod.rs] [Determinism] [Initialization order dependency] Does the order of initializing io_pricing, space_pricing, and change_set_configs matter? Can different initialization orders lead to different final gas calculations? (Medium)
